ygData.subject: Re: BBC Answers here
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard it is on a necro spawn in the same hidden room as the SK. Where you would take a right down the hall to get the SK, you would take a left and go
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard it is on a necro spawn in the same hidden room as the SK. Where you would take a right down the hall to get the SK, you would take a left and go down the hall opposite of the SK instead. The name of the necro is the therouligist or something like that. Lately, he has been camped heavier then the SK.

Adol, 17th Level Paladin of Freeport
---------- Original Text ----------

The 3rd floor Ogre SK. He spawns in the room behind the hidden wall.

Adol, 17th Level Paladin of Freeport

>>


Is this string of posts referring to Befallen Dungeon? If so, which mob and
where drops the Gossimer Robe?

Wizaro
